text: tamara pahela ame jetala pana payagambaro mokalya che, badham purusa ja hata, jemani tarapha ame vahi avatarita karata gaya, sum dharati para hari-pharine te'o'e joyum nathi ke temanathi pahelana lokoni kevi dasa tha'i, kharekhara akheratanum ghara daravavala'o mate ghanum ja uttama che, sum to pana tame nathi samajata
